title: Escrowme platform offers a unique mediation service to customers who want to buy and sell digital and real products in Algeria
subtitle: Escrowme platform is characterized by an easy to use and safe user interface, low commission, and excellent technical support, which makes the mediation process easy and smooth for everyone.
guideTitle: escrowme schema for guiding you to the mediation service.

qna.question: What is the mediation service and how does it work?
qna.answer: It is a service to escrowing deals between the seller and the buyer and acts as a third part to escrow the deal based on the terms agreed upon between the seller and the buyer.. To understand more how the mediation service works, watch the video clip above.

qna.question: How can I register on the platform and create an account?
qna.answer: The registration process on the platform is free and takes place by entering the information represented in: username, phone number, and account password.

qna.question: How can I contact the seller and make the purchase?
qna.answer: Communication between the seller and the buyer on the platform is available through the platform’s chat system, but the chat on the platform is a means of communication to complete the transaction and not to search for a seller or buyer.

qna.question: What are the available payment methods?
qna.answer: Currently, the available payment methods are with the golden card and all Algerian bank cards only.

qna.question: What is the return and refund policy if I am not satisfied with the product?
qna.answer: The 'Escrowme' platform is not a store for selling products but rather a means of escrowing deals. The return and refund policy is only if the delivered product is in violation of the agreed terms of the deal.

qna.question: How can I get customer service in case of problems or inquiries?
qna.answer: Escrowme platform includes a direct chat system with platform support in case of problems or inquiries.

qna.question: What guarantees does the platform provide to buyers and sellers?
qna.answer: For buyers, their money is kept on the platform until successful receipt of the product. As for sellers, the process of sending the product takes place after the payment process by the buyer.

qna.question: Can I buy and sell on the platform without having to subscribe to the mediation service?
qna.answer: No, the registration process on the platform is mandatory before embarking on a mediation transaction.

footerDescription: La plateforme Escrowme est une plateforme qui propose un service de médiation entre le vendeur et l'acheteur, permettant de mener des transactions d'achat et de vente dans des conditions sécurisées et d'éviter les cas de fraude.

feature.title: Accepter les conditions
feature.content: Le vendeur accède à la plateforme et remplit un formulaire décrivant les conditions prédéfinies et accepte les conditions de la plateforme.

feature.title: Paiement et Escrow
feature.content: L'acheteur et le vendeur conviennent des conditions prédéfinies, telles que les détails du produit et le prix, à conserver en escrow jusqu'à la fin de la transaction.

feature.title: Livraison
feature.content: L'acheteur suit le lien reçu du vendeur et finalise l'achat.

feature.title: L'acheteur accepte le produit
feature.content: L'acheteur confirme avoir reçu le produit conformément aux modalités convenues.

feature.title: Paiement sécurisé
feature.content: Escrowme transfère le paiement au vendeur de manière sécurisée, garantissant une transaction sûre.

toGetStarted: Pour commencer et rejoindre notre plateforme, il est essentiel de vous inscrire en tant que vendeur professionnel. Veuillez cliquer sur le bouton ci-dessous pour commencer le processus d'inscription.
shopInbox: Boîte de réception de la boutique
servicesAcceptedByAdmin: Tous les services acceptés par l'administrateur
servicesAcceptedByClient: Tous les services acceptés par le client
everythingYouNeed: Tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour accepter les paiements par carte et développer votre entreprise n'importe où sur la planète
register: S'inscrire en tant que nouvel utilisateur
name: Nom
